long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Origin Shopping Button is a Chrome browser extension that notifies users when they visit an online merchant who will donate a portion of every purchase to Origin Coffee and Tea. 

The user may also visit The Origin Shopping & Donation Portal at http://origin.shoppinganddonation.com/ to find additional online stores that participate in this Origin Coffee and Tea donation program.
